text: Son of the Golden West is a 1928 American silent western film directed by Eugene Forde and starring Tom Mix, Sharon Lynn and Thomas G. Lingham.Jensen p.235 ==Cast== * Tom Mix as Tom Hardy * Tony the Horse as Tony, Tom's Horse * Sharon Lynn as Alice Calhoun * Thomas G. Lingham as Jim Calhoun * Duke R. Lee as Slade * Lee Shumway as Tennessee * Fritzi Ridgeway as Rita * Joey Ray as Keller * Mark Hamilton as Kane * Wynn Mace as Slade's Henchman ==References== ==Bibliography== * Jensen, Richard D. The Amazing Tom Mix: The Most Famous Cowboy of the Movies. 2005. ==External links== * * Category:American films Category:1928 Western (genre) films Category:American Western (genre) films Category:American silent feature films Category:English-language films Category:Films directed by Eugene Forde Category:1928 films Category:American black-and-white films Category:Film Booking Offices of America films
title: Son of the Golden West
